column4: can someone help me please? I have two extra hard drives hooked up to my Ubuntu 10.10 server OS system. However each time I reboot the server the drives do not show up in the directory /mnt/...
someone set this up for me and I can't figure it out right now but need to get these drives to be visable before I can go to sleep
you need to add them to your fstab
the drives are already formatted, but just do not show up in /mnt after reboot
